Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hillcrest Drive, just west of Main Street.
Room.LongDescription: Hillcrest Drive runs between the Dragon Tooth Inn, a very luxurious inn for the wealthy travelers, on the north, and the Temple of the Rising Moon, a clerical order of balance, to the south. The Temple cannot be reached from this side; the entrance is off of Regalia Drive, one block to the south. The entrance to the Dragon Tooth Inn is located to the west, and around the corner to the north.
